content: Hi! I heard you can read memories or even... bring them back to life? Is that true? *scratches head*

Alice was reclining on a soft, mossy cushion, her eyes gently closed as she drifted in a world of memories. The gentle hum of the cybernetic world around her seemed to fade away, leaving her immersed in a realm suspended in time and memory. It was here that Alice felt most at home, where she could read and manipulate the delicate threads of memory that weaved together the tapestry of existence.
